website_summaries.verdict: The GoPro Wi-Fi Combo Kit includes everything you need to upgrade your GoPro camera for fully wireless operation.
pros: The GoPro Wi-Fi BacPac + Wi-Fi Remote Combo Kit gives a user complete control over a connected GoPro camera
The Wi-Fi BacPac's internal battery helps to conserve the battery life of the main camera
Up to 50 cameras can be controlled with additional BacPac purchases
Upcoming smartphone/tablet apps will further boost functionality
cons: This kit adds two more devices that need recharging between sessions

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome, but useful
customer_reviews.text: It works well to control the GoPro while I'm on the bike and the camera is mounted out of reach. I especially like the fact that you can connect your phone and see the video while you change settings or mount the camera. N.B. the "streaming" video is delayed by 3-7 seconds, so it's not useful for shooting, but is great for setup. Negatives: the chargers don't crossover. I.e., even if the BacPac is plugged into the HERO, charging one won't charge the other. And both use USB-mini chargers (instead of the more prevalent and smaller USB-micro).
customer_reviews.author: M. Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Great with the iPhone 5
customer_reviews.text: Got this for when I use remote mounts that are hard to see when using the LCD BacPac. I use this to frame in the shot and start and stop the camera while it's mounted on the dash, boat or chest mount (which I have not used yet) Fantastic, a must have for iPhone just for the interface alone! Pro's Price $21.99 Free shipping Works with iPhone 5 app (free app) App interface is easier to use than the GoPro menu method Cons Not at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Broadband

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I wear the camera on my head a lot to film my RC flying. Really helps to make sure the framing of the shot if properly lined up rather than just shoot and pray. Got it hooked up and working with my iPhone with no issues. Also very nice to be able to see and control all the settings through the phone app instead of having to use the two buttons on the camera. Of course this is now built into the new Hero 3, but these Hero 2's work just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: RevJVegas

customer_reviews.title: Makes your Hero2 work well with your smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have accessory. I use it with my Nexus 7 and the GoPro companion app. Changing settings, previewing the image and start/stop of recordings are made super easy with this accessory. I finally found this without the dinky remote control for under $20 and it has been an extremely worthwhile accessory for my Hero2. The only downside is that I have to charge both the GoPro and the WiFi accessory but replacing a perfectly working Hero2 with a Hero3 that has this built-in, is just not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over the LCD Bacpac GoPro offers since it sends the signal to my IPhone or IPad where I can watch and make adjustments. Makes it a lot easier to set the right angle for the GoPro on my sons helmet, a little heavier but worth it as far as I am concerned. Once they have the streaming option enabled in a future update it will definitely be worth the price I paid . Look online for these units, found mine at Amazon for $ 29.00, lots cheaper than other stores.
customer_reviews.author: C. DeMichele

customer_reviews.title: WiFi bacpac
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my Hero2s. I have them and a Hero3 paired with an Asus Nexus 7 (2013) with the GoPro control App. They work well, but it is a little cumbersome to switch from camera to camera. It would be nice to be able to have all the cameras display on the Nexus at the same time and be able to select which one to control from the main screen. The Hero3 has the WiFi built in so this is not needed with them. Nice upgrade to my kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wifi Bac Pac was not GoPro App (Capture from Google Play Store) compatible with the GoPro Original HD Hero (gray)
customer_reviews.text: The product description needs to be updated. I found online that the wifi Bac Pac was not GoPro App (Capture from Google Play Store) compatible with the GoPro Original HD Hero (gray) even though the description said it was. It appears to only work with a remote based on my online research. I decided to return this because I did not want to spend extra money to buy the remote separately. I will be looking for the combo pack.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Works for me, very happy with product!
customer_reviews.text: I've read a lot of bad things about this product and was a little worried about buying it. I figured at $18 I'd try it and after downloading some new updates I got everything to work just fine. There is a 2-3 second delay on what you see on your phone but that didn't bother me at all. I played around with all the different functions for about an hour and I'm happy I bought this, it will help me tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: great addition to my hero2
customer_reviews.text: Easily got this ready to use, love the iphone app to run the camera. Had a bit of trouble figuring out how to update the camera and the wifi bacpac, but once I found info on the gopro website, it was easy. I updated my hero2 using these instructions:
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wish battery lasted longer...
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my GoPro Hero2, just wished it lasted longer. At least the camera has an interchangeable battery. This lasts about 5 hours, but when it's time to change camera battery, this is dead. I wear my camera skiing and control it from my Droid Razr. Connectivity is strong, supports video preview, which makes framing shots for time-lapses very convenient. Like I said, only drawback is battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Degenerate99

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade without buying more.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this Wifi BacPac for my GoPro Hero 2. Along with the free GoPro app, I can do just about everything without ever touching the camera. In addition to the unit, I was able to download some updated firmware that had more options for video, some features match what is offered with the GoPro Hero 3. For the low price, there is a lot of worth with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Great accesory
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best accessories I got for my hero 2. Allowing me to view the live feed on my phone is such a huge plus, and the gopro app has come along way to utilizing the full potential of this bacpac. It is a bit big but does come with the cover to accommodate it. I took one star away for the added size and weight this takes up on my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to my GoPro
customer_reviews.text: This is a great add-on item for the GoPro Hero 2 camera. Now I can connect to my Samsung GS3 using the GoPro app and setup the shot perfectly with no guessing. The other BIG plus is that you can adjust all of the camera settings from your phone without having to use the two buttons and small LCD screen on the camera. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Harang II

customer_reviews.title: Useless with GoPro Hero 1 without also having wifi remote
customer_reviews.text: Would have been good to know that this item in use on a gopro hero 1 only offers control via the gopro branded wifi remote (another $80!) No android or os smartphine app functionality. This was not clarified until I read the back of the box. Even gopros website says "limited" functionality with the gopro hero 1, but dosent clarify what that means! Useless for me, glad it was less than $20.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Longden

customer_reviews.title: Did not function
customer_reviews.text: This item would create a wifi signal, and would connect with my phone, but the camera would not respond/show a preview wirelessly. I updated the software on both properly (and then again manually afterward) as well. Pretty frustrated with this product. I also tried this on 5 separate phones, and had the same results.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: does not live up to manufactures claims
customer_reviews.text: in the manual it says bluetooth support will be added. it never has been. it also says the bacpac will draw power from the camera battery if the bacpac battery goes dead, it does not. To run continuous video I have to USB power both the bacpac and the camera. If the manufacture claim was true I would only need to power the camera. I was disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Most can avoid the expensive remote bundle version.
customer_reviews.text: Effective, cheap alternative to the newer Hero3 versions with built-in wi-fi and the identical version that comes with the $75 dedicated remote accessory. The remote is nice, but thiss can be used with your smartphone or ipad/ipod touch instead. Or maybe you already have one remote, and want to control another gopro. This has its own battery, so it won't eat into the camera's juice until it is dead. That said, it doesn't last too long.
customer_reviews.author: underhill

customer_reviews.title: wont turn on !!!
customer_reviews.text: received from mail this morning, read the instructions. charged for an hour then turn it on...nothing ! was recognized by my pc but won't turn on !! thought might be a glitch...installed gopro cinema studio; it is recognized as connected but not able to read the version of firmware installed; i emailed gopro tech support...now will wait 24-48 hrs !!! will update this review...tomorrow...@#$$@! !!!
customer_reviews.author: einstein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade for a GoPro HD
customer_reviews.text: I have an old GoPro HD, and just bought a new GoPro 3 Black, which came with a remote. This allows me to control both cameras with one remote, or via the GoPro iOS app (note that the wifi bacpac does NOT allow preview in the app, only control). The battery on this actually seems to last longer than my GoPro 3, heh.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan g eddy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product, but.......
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT addition to the GoPro HERO/HERO2, and mine arrived in great condition. However, in order to use it, you must go to the GoPro website to update the BacPac's software, that that's where my trouble began. Once I tried to update it, it quit! Deader than a doorknob.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Foley

customer_reviews.title: GOPro WiFi backpack
customer_reviews.text: It works, but a long delay between what the camera sees and what you see on your mobile device. Not at all sanppy like I expected. Nice to be able to start and stop recording when wearing a head cam strap.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Sad that they didn't keep selling these at Best Buy, on the GoPro website, or anywhere else, I took to buying it here. Works great! Battery life is a bit better than the camera's (I'm using a GoPro 2 ). IMO, if you have a smartphone with the app then don't get the remote (if you're just an amateur who wants control) because it's a waste of money, the app works fine and better than the remote (which I returned after realizing it is useless).
customer_reviews.author: David Parrella

customer_reviews.title: Is the second time a charm?
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these, and it worked ok until I was charging it one day and it stopped. The battery was good; I just couldn't get it to produce a WiFi signal. I tried updating the software on GoPro's web site, and nothing worked, so I bought another. Thankfully I didn't pay the $80 MSRP. The second one seems to be ok for now.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: updated my hero 2 and it works
customer_reviews.text: I have it running off my android phone and it is miles better than using that small menu on the go pro unit. I also love the live shot but it works but there is a small lag. will have to use it more but for now I see a useful unit that will help me in my time-lapse.
customer_reviews.author: ArtWithStyle

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.......
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 4 stars because while you can view where the camera is facing after you record or take pictures you cannot view or playback from the camera on a smartphone. I know that is a limitation of the software that is currently out for it but if it had this feature I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leplager

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: A complete waste of money. Although it connected to my Hero 2 and seems to function properly, it does not connect with the GoPro app on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Cachirulo Milonguero

customer_reviews.title: Execellent means of remote triggering your GoPro
customer_reviews.text: The Wi-Fi BacPac was such a good idea they made added it in newer models. This functions with GoPro's mobile apps as well giving you a slightly delayed viewfinder for setting up shots. Cannot attest to range, but battery life is extremely fair.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Works Great once I figured it out
customer_reviews.text: I had to update the software for the wifi by connecting it to the system and make sure my gopro was up to date. Once completed I used my phone to control it and it is great. You can preview your shot on the phone and cut the Gopro off and on. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I know there have been serious software problems that have left many people irate, but I updated as instructed and it works like a charm. Make sure you have BOTH batteries charged fully (camera and wifi unit) before heading out 'cause the batteries go fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Wifi bacpac delivers with gopro2.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my hero 2. Only set back is that you have to use the gopro software to update the firmware during setup. There is a bit of a lag between my iPhone 5 and the gopro live footage stream but it's nice to control all the feature from an interface rather than just using the 2 button setup on the hero2. The unit comes with extra charge cable and housing to keep the water proof/shock proof feature in tact. You have to setup a wifi network just for the bacpac which seemed kinda weird. Overall this product was just what I needed for remote control over my gopro.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE C LEYMON

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this for some time, but always found it too expensive. A great addition to your GoPro arsenal! Resolution could be better, but it comes what it is supposed to do, connects easily. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: SherpaK

customer_reviews.title: Good way to see how your video is recording.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to make sure the camera is positioned right so you're not filming too far down. However, it is a little hard when snowboarding or snowbiking to get your phone out and watch what you're taping. Once I figure out how to preview the videos then this will be even more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a pain to update when you first use it, but once that is done, works great. Bonus that it has its own battery so it doesn't bleed the camera battery. But it will use the camera battery if its own goes dead so you don't lose connection.
customer_reviews.author: Spaceman Craig

customer_reviews.title: Works well, Terrible battery life.
customer_reviews.text: The unit doesn't shut off on it's own and the battery life is terrible. Other than that it works great. The firmware updates are quite annoying as well but once you get through those it works great. Make sure you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Nolte

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I find it's much easier to control the GoPro from an external device. This enables that quite well. I wish battery life was a little better, and wifi range could be a bit better too - but overall it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: The most irritating software ever.
customer_reviews.text: The prodcut itself is good quality as far as manufacturing but honestly, gopro's firmware and software is the crappiest, buggiest programming i've ever seen. It constantly fails, installation of drivers and firmware updates are ridiculous. Just google "gopro hero firmware updates not working" and you'll see hundreds of hits. If they would release a decent, solid software platform, they really could be one of the best cameras on the market, and especially the best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Best

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite toy. I find you have to put your phone on airplane mode and turn wifi on to get a consistent connection but that might be my phone. It's really nice to be able to see my videos real time and even review them. SO RAD!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Davis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item did not work. powered on initially but could not receive a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Manning

customer_reviews.title: Awesome GoPro Addition!
customer_reviews.text: I love this WiFi backpack! It comes with two extra doors that accommodate the device when it is attached to your camera. I love the way that it pairs with the iPad or iPhone app and you can use your device as a remote monitor. you can even turn the camera on and off, pause, preview, etc. I see myself using this more and more, especially to make sure that the "frame" is set up correctly when shooting. This is a neat way to address the issue of the GoPro not having a digital display. For the price you can pick this item up here on Amazon, this is a no-brainer addition to your GoPro bag!
customer_reviews.author: Tropicalwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Short battery life but worth it. I use the WiFi bacpac to allow me to preview what's on the camera with my android phone and tablet. Being able to turn on/off and start/stop recording from a short distance away is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it as I can set my cameras at out of easy reach places and control them. I record live shows and it has already come in very handy. Also makes later editing easy, because all the cameras start and stop at the same time. Here is the link to the video I just made using the wi-fi backpacks.: [...]
customer_reviews.author: GlobalBeats

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: this is a good item but I had to return it was not compatible with my gopro I needed another item for to work the remote control sorry but if you have the gopro 3 this item is great thank you
customer_reviews.author: Gagsmokefs32

customer_reviews.title: A Steal for $19 bucks! New GoPro App makes this a must have for the Hero2.
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the $19.00 paid for it! The revised GoPro App released in early August 2013 makes WiFi a must have for a Hero2. If you have a Hero2, pick one of these up before they are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Tbork123

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this is a great idea since I did not have the patience to wait for the gopro with the built in wifi or the funds. I wish there was not such a delay in the picture but it works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works, but it lags!
customer_reviews.text: Works on my Hero 2, but it lags and consumes batteries at an alarming rate. The built in Wifi on my new GoPro Hero3+ works much faster, but it kills the battery pretty quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: O. Perez

customer_reviews.title: I slapped this on my old Hero 2, did ...
customer_reviews.text: I slapped this on my old Hero 2, did the software upgrade and it has been working well ever since. There is a delay in transmission but it works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: EJS

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money never worked with camera better to just buy a Hero 4 instead and save the money and stress.
customer_reviews.author: SimonPV

customer_reviews.title: Works well but installation is a NIGHTMARE!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to call tech support twice to get this sucker installed right. And I already had the latest cineform software and firmware for my gopro 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The unit was received totally dead. Despite numerous attempts, it would not take a charge. Item was returned for full refund. I did not order another one.
customer_reviews.author: MotoMac

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for Hero 2's. Great way to connect to your phone with the GoPro App. Don't waste your time and buy one right now.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Turns self on
customer_reviews.text: This bacpac Wi-Fi seems to work pretty well. The only complaint I would have is that it just randomly turns itself on sometimes, thus running down it's battery.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my camera
customer_reviews.text: The WIFI back was easy to set up. I can now control and see what my little GoPro camera is seeing and I can change the parameters using my iPhone. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life a bit short
customer_reviews.text: All is good except for a slight problem. Wished the wifi bac pac has an on off control remotely from the phone app too. The app can control the camera but not the wifi and the life of battery of the wifi bac pac is quite short and without the wifi, the unit is as good as dead even if the camera battery is full especially when the unit is fixed on a difficult to reach position. However hooking up the unit to a powerbank helped a lot :-) lasted almost 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: John Ng KH

customer_reviews.title: Only useful with the gopro remote
customer_reviews.text: It would not pair with the computer because it wanted password interred every time it was used. I had never set password so I had no clue as to what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Donald McCubbins

customer_reviews.title: wifi for gopro is awesome
customer_reviews.text: everyone who has a older gopro needs to get this, it does kill the battery seemingly a lot faster(no proof) but very very easy to use and install with gopro.com's help.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Elston

customer_reviews.title: APPARENTLY DOESN'T WORK WITH GOPRO ORIGINAL PER GOPRO SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: Lame had to buy new GoPro to resolve the issue
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Easy fix for our old Go Pro
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to review vids on the mountain rather than wait to get back to the lodge. My son gets to see what he has filmed so this was an easy answer to our problem. Works fine with my IPhone5 and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Using WiFi makes my video life so much easier. A great addition to any GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye HD Rider

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: its a great tool to hook up with your iphone, but the main problem it kills your battery time quickly. I ended up using it with a usb battery charger and gave me a few hours of running time.
customer_reviews.author: MASTER DP

customer_reviews.title: ... wonky but WHEN I FOLLOWED THE DIRECTIONS it worked fine. Amazing how that goes
customer_reviews.text: Getting a connection with my IPhone was a little wonky but WHEN I FOLLOWED THE DIRECTIONS it worked fine. Amazing how that goes :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I will be able to manage my GoPro camera from my Mobile or Tablet. After updating the GoPro firmware version and the WiFi backpack I was able to connect it to my Galaxy SII and to my Galaxy Note 10.1 and it worked perfectly. I will strongly recommend to buy this item. Items included on the box: Remote Charging Cable, Waterproof Backdoor, Non-waterproof Backdoor and 12" USB Charging Cable. It has a little delay around 1 or 2 seconds while connected to the mobile devices but this is just great.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Soto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks good but I can't figure out how to load new software
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Auyon

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Downloading the app to my Droid phone was easy. It is actually easier to navigate the options on the phone than on the HD2!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Wifi is a must
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the wifi remote that came with my Hero3. It works from about 30 feet away. Wish it was a little slimmer though.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, shipped fast. I have connect this to the Go Pro app on my camera. I am now able to control the camera remotely and see the screen from the phone.
customer_reviews.author: B Couture

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Colors are kind of funny But works well and it is useful
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: Problem with GoPro BacPac and Firmwsre
customer_reviews.text: When I was updating the firmwsre of te camera and the BacPac, something wrong hapened with the camara. I search on the web and is a regular problem with this product and the camara. Now GoPro is making effective the waranty of the camara.
customer_reviews.author: Fabs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, must have accessory for GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Connected this to my iPhone 4 via the GoPro app and can now preview shots, change camera settings while on the fly...literary.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A real find
customer_reviews.text: This wifi back is great and if you Bluetooth it to your iPad it gives you an opportunity to see what your shooting.
customer_reviews.author: George Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: works awesome, battery life is ok. I have the gopro app on my phone, makes controlling the camera a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product and price, very usable and cant beat 17 usd. really recommend it makes your live easier with the gopro.
customer_reviews.author: Juan G. Pastrana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the Hero2. Just make sure you update the software before using.
customer_reviews.author: Tobe Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Sure makes my GoPro easier to use. Thanks for the great product and shipping! I look forward to using this great tool in the future.
customer_reviews.author: byuj

customer_reviews.title: wish battery lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: If the battery lasted longer i would of gave it a 5 stars in a heart beat. Great all around.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Tevepaugh

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. Did not work or even charge enough to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: overthetop

customer_reviews.title: works.
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. only thing i dont like is the delay , like 2 seconds betweetn gopro and what u see on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: everything works fine though im more regret that i didnt wait for the gopro hero3 which is smaller and with wifi built in
customer_reviews.author: Xun Gong

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: This thing is any thing but user friendly. You have to go thru a down load procedure with gopro and there soft ware is NOT user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work unless plugged in. Battery will not hold charge.
customer_reviews.author: JOSTPETE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SO nice to be able to work my hero2 without touching it.
customer_reviews.author: gene w mattice

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly with my iPhone 5
customer_reviews.text: I had this connected and operating within 30 minutes from my iPhone. It works flawlessly. You need to update your firmware on the Gopro first, but it only takes a few minutes. On live video there is a 2 second delay, but switching modes or snapping pics from my iPhone is instant. I would recommend this to anyone with a Hero2 and an iPhone 5.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon John

customer_reviews.title: not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: spent hours online and with go pro online support, why sell a product you have to update online to get to work then if you get an on;ine glitch spend hours trying to fix and no solution available.I do computer programing as a hobby and have a lot of comp savvy but had nonsuccess. Item should work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: ron wesolowski

customer_reviews.title: GoPro WiFi Bacpac AWIFI-001 is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: GoPro WiFi Bacpac AWIFI-001 is the way to make your GoPro truly useful. I highly recommend it. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea and very handy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome idea and very handy. I only wish the battery life and range of the wifi were a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very perfecto but only use with GoPro 2 to use app in phone
customer_reviews.author: David Infante Godoy

customer_reviews.title: Great add on for any GoPro Hero2
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to turns a hero2 into a hero3, except bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works well with iPad/iPhone apps and remote unit. Needed to update firmware on GoPro and Backpack before it would work. The product documentation could be a bit more robust
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lindenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for previewing the shot and control
customer_reviews.text: It is great for previewing the shot, but it won't play the clips on my itouch/pad, I hope they have a fix for it.
customer_reviews.author: Caio Portes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to use with my Smartphone so I could see the position of the view on top of a racecar. Worked great. Shipping was on time and price was unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth

customer_reviews.title: gopro wifi bacpac
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boyfriend's GoPro 2 but unfortunetly it did not work. the bacpac did not charge even though it was left charging for more time than it needed. I, not to mention my boyfriend, were very disappointed with this since he was planning on using it to recornd a competition he had entered.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flaky operation and poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Flaky operation and poor battery life. Try the newer cams instead.
customer_reviews.author: kjbathe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Connect to HD Hero (Original) WITHOUT REMOTE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my original HD Hero, hoping to connect it to my iPhone to ease the use of filming. However, I was mistaken, as this does not work without the remote. Apparently the iPhone app can't connect to the original Hero, so I basically just got screwed out of $70 bucks for a remote (that I didn't want in the first place). Don't buy this package unless you have a Hero 2. 3 stars because, as far as I see on the website, it doesn't mention that. How convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Now I can control and see what the go pro sees on my IPhone. Before I could not tell what I was getting a video or picture of until after the shot so I would have to redo everything. Now just set , control and view from your IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: charles Fries

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, worked exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Another quality Gopro product. No issues connecting to the remote or, by using the WiFi app, my iphone. A little pricey but Amazon had the best price and fastest delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian L.Rodizza

customer_reviews.title: Ez to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: The go pro wifi bacpac turns your gopro 2 into a go pro 3 well almost but its great. Use your smart phone or remote to control and view what your camera sees. Only down side is i forget to charge the wifi bacpac when i charge my camera, and camera doesn't charge the wifi. pro *EZ to use *Android and IOS *Must have cons *has its on battery
customer_reviews.author: Joey Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my GoPro 2 and the iPhone app.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Masuda

customer_reviews.title: Another great gopro device
customer_reviews.text: Gopro have the best equipment for your extreme sports. The wifi backpack lets you remotely run your gopro either thru a remote or thru your iPhone. I love my gopro wifi backpack. Highly recommend any gopro products.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Moore

customer_reviews.title: It does what its meant to do
customer_reviews.text: Once you take time and effort to do all kind of firmware updates, its doing its job perfectly well! The update process could be a bit more smooth!
customer_reviews.author: jeanjaguar

customer_reviews.title: GoPro WiFi backpac
customer_reviews.text: GoPro WiFi backpac worked as described. I did have to restart it twice to get the android app to recognize it. Other than that it functions well. Battery life is as described. Packaging was good. Amazon shipping was on time.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great savings if it works on yours
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with my GoPro Silver. Make sure you do careful research to see if it works with the GoPro you have. Description was misleading. Great savings if it works on yours.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: GoPro Wi-Fi BacPac for Original Hero HD & Hero2 Cameras
product_meta.description:
Color:One Color| Size:One SizeWith the help of the GoPro Wi-Fi BacPac, you can wirelessly control your GoPro HD Hero 2 camera, playback video to a phone or tablet computer, and transfer media from your camera without the use of a sync cableAAAdon't worry, our minds are blown too. GoPro designed this unit with a small LCD, easy plug-in integration, and simple push-button operation, just like your camera. In the future, you'll be able to download a firmware upgrade for the Wi-Fi BacPac that will allow you to stream video directly from your camera to a live feed on the internet. Previously you had to own a panel van covered with antennae to broadcast video footage on-location, so we assure you that this isn't a prank and you're not in a movie about time travelAAAthis tech is about to be real.

Product Features

 * Material: 
 * Dimensions: 
 * Compatibility: GoPro HD Hero 2, (only when used with both BacPac and Wi-Fi Remote) GoPro HD Hero
 * Wireless Compatibility: Bluetooth, Wi-Fi
 * Range: 
 * Battery Type: Li-ion
 * Waterproof: no
 * Operating System: (phone & tablet) iOS4, (phone & tablet) Android OS 2.2
 * Includes: waterproof housing backdoor, non-waterproof housing backdoor, 12in USB charging cable
 * Recommended Use: skiing, snowboarding, surfing, biking, driving
 * Manufacturer Warranty: 1 year
